example.name: buffalo-v: the most ridiculous example in the corpus.
example.text: Buffalo buffalo [0]-1 Buffalo buffalo buffalo *-1 buffalo Buffalo buffalo.
example.note: Alright... who put this in the corpus? The interpretation is: buffaloes from Buffalo, NY, who are buffaloed by buffaloes from Buffalo, NY, also buffalo buffaloes from Buffalo, NY.

example.name: buffalo-v
example.text: A client who says Hendriks buffaloed him into providing cover for an armored car robbery in 1967
example.arg: into providing cover for an armored car robbery
